DataElement.preferredName: Patient Period Post Major Bone Marrow Radiation Therapy Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating the patient meets the eligibility requirements for participation in a clinical trial with regards to time elapsed since substantial bone marrow irradiation was given.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Period Post Major Bone Marrow Radiation Therapy Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:An interval of time._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Greater or bigger in amount, extent, or size._The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes._Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Period Post Major Bone Marrow Radiation Therapy Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: An interval of time.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Greater or bigger in amount, extent, or size.:The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Greater or bigger in amount, extent, or size.
The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Workflow and Registration Status Changed per Brenda Duggan; 05.16.18; ADVL1521 - WWL

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has time elapsed since substantial bone marrow irradiation was given?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been greater than or equal to 4 weeks since other substantial bone marrow irradiation was given?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been at least 4 weeks since other substantial bone marrow irradiation was given?
